alert.note: Alert for Clark; Garland; Hot Spring; Montgomery; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 10:46PM CST until March 02 at 11:45PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Pike County in southwestern Arkansas... Garland County in central Arkansas... Montgomery County in western Arkansas... Southwestern Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 1145 PM CST. * At 1045 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oden to near Daisy State Park to near Washington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Hot Springs Village... Arkadelphia... Murfreesboro... Mount Ida... Glenwood... Gurdon... Mountain Pine... Amity... Caddo Valley... Norman... Oden... Okolona... Daisy... Whelen Springs... Beirne... Gum Springs in Clark County... Daisy State Park... Crater Of Diamonds State Park... Narrows Dam... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central, western and southwestern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Garland; Hot Spring; Montgomery; Pike
